title: Adarushan no Hanayome vol.1
description: Adarshan and the Castoria Empire have been waging war against each other, but it is only a matter of time before Adarshan falls. In order to tie an alliance between the two countries, the king of Adarshan forces his brother, Alexid Deke Adars, into a political marriage with Castoria's sixth imperial princess, Justinia. He is unwilling from the beginning, and shocked when he later discovers that his bride-to-be is only 10 years old! And when the two finally meet, Justinia makes it clear that she hates his guts.
author: AMEKAWA Kei
